WorkItem.ClosedComment: Assuming this is just a proxy issue. We already have a ticket for that. User can run the Silverlight version to get around his proxy for now.
WorkItem.Description:
I am using the downlaodable Rawr 4.0.21 (Mar 10, 2011) [r58642]. Every time I try to load a character I receive the following error, with no suggested fix. The armory is up and can be accessed from the same pc on the same network so it is not an armory issue.
 
Error Message:
 
The remote server returned an error: (403) Forbidden.
 
Stack Trace:
 
   at System.Net.HttpWebRequest.EndGetResponse(IAsyncResult asyncResult)
   at System.Net.WebClient.GetWebResponse(WebRequest request, IAsyncResult result)
   at System.Net.WebClient.DownloadBitsResponseCallback(IAsyncResult result)
 
Suggested Fix:
 
No Suggested Fix
WorkItem.Summary: [LoadCharacter] The remote server returned an error: (403) Forbidden

Comments.Message: how about a hint? like.. what server, what characters ?
I cant' repro this without your character info. Other characters loading fine.
Any character, any server. No charaters will load.

Try Firetree, Valhanne is the one I am trying to load now. 

Works fine on home pc no matter who I try to load. Possible proxy issue? Your trouble shooting posting guidlines page has the following on that possibility:

Are you using a Proxy (as many Corporate Environments do)? 
Did you enter the proxy info into Rawr (Tools > Options > Network Settings) 
Are you using a Domain and did you enter DOMAINNAME\username vs just username? If you did, try the other method.

However these menu selection no longer exist in your current build of Rawr 4.0.21 (Mar 10, 2011) [r58642]. Is there another way to do this now?

No, we do not have a way to put in proxy info for the WPF build yet and there's already a ticket open for that. Try using the silverlight version, that follows browser proxy.

Of course if you don't use a proxy, this doesn't matter anyway.
